section1.description: Computer Science student at the University of Copenhagen

section2.name: Niklas
section2.ageDescription: I am 19 years old. I have always been very interested in technology and how software works. In my second year of high school, I picked up programming and started coding games in Unity, and then various small projects for my own use. This has led to my current love for programming, problem-solving, and being creative.
section2.hobbiesDescription1: In my free time, I play and coach
section2.hobbiesDescription4: . I also love being creative by

history.title: History and Experience
history.bsc: Current student in the Computer Science program at University of Copenhagen. Pursuing my dream of becoming a software developer.
history.highschoolDescription: In 2023, I graduated from high school. After that, I was ready to start university immediately and really gain experience in software development.
history.selftaughtDescription: Started developing small Unity games and taught myself to code in C#. This was the beginning of my interest in software development.

projects.title: Projects
projects.information: Information about all projects can be found on GitHub

project1.name: FastPost
project1.description: FastPost is a python script that can automatically post instagram reels and youtube shorts.

project2.name: Breakout
project2.description: Our version of the classic game of breakout, made in C#. It's been thoroughly tested and designed with design patterns in mind.

projects.moreProjectsHeader: More Projects available through the link below

handbook.title: Team Handbook
handbook.intro: Welcome to our volleyball team! This handbook provides essential information about our team's values, policies, and procedures.

playersList.item1: Attend all practices and games on time.
playersList.item2: Show respect to teammates, opponents, and officials.
playersList.item3: Maintain a positive attitude and strive for improvement.

parentsList.item2: Communicate any concerns with the coach privately.
parentsList.item3: Promote good sportsmanship from the sidelines.

coachList.item1: Provide a safe and positive learning environment.
coachList.item2: Offer constructive feedback to help players grow.
coachList.item3: Communicate openly with players and parents.

strategies.title: Team Strategies
strategies.intro: Our team employs various strategies to maximize our performance on the court.

defensiveList.item3: Transitioning quickly from defense to offense.

fundamentals.title: Volleyball Fundamentals
fundamentals.intro: Understanding the fundamentals is crucial for every player.
fundamentals.servingDesc: Serving is the act of putting the ball into play. Mastery of different serving techniques can give the team an advantage.
fundamentals.passingDesc: Accurate passing is essential for setting up offensive plays. It requires focus and proper technique.

playerHome.title: Player's Corner
playerHome.description: Explore training plans, techniques, and tips to improve your game.
